feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.123.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improvement: Native Integration Deprecation Details and Sync Redirect by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3404
  • Add warning on secret deletions where it's being imported by another folder by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3356
  • Improvement: Rollback Secret V1 Create Deprecation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3417
  • Avoid throwing on getFolderIsImportedBy no folder found by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3423
  • Feature: Add General Env Var for Allowing Internal IP Connections by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3418

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.123.0-postgres...infisical/v0.123.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.123.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase Certificate Alternative Names (SAN) Character Limit to 4096 by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3421
  • feat: add metadata based permissions for dynamic secret by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3391
  • Fixed v1/folders API backward compatibility with directory parameter by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3428
  • feat: dashboard failing on failing check by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3433
  • Improve random value generator modal UI by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3434
  • Feature: Auth0 Connection and Client Secret Rotation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3397
  • misc: made jwt signature alg configurable for oidc by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.123.1-postgres...infisical/v0.123.2-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.124.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add notification on Service Token expiration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3419
  • Add SAML doc links to Org Settings by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3437
  • Add project delete protection by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3422
  • misc: allow org admins to bypass sso enforcement by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3424
  • Updated doc on db permission change by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3438
  • Improvement: Set Project Delete Protection to False by Default by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3444
  • Fix: Vercel Connection Validation API Call by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3445
  • Feature: Windmill Connection and Sync by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3429
  • Improved saml error messages by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3448
  • Documentation: Correct Developer Role Description by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3449
  • Updated error message on update org for saml/oidc enforcement by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3396

New Contributors

  • @juhnny5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3406

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.123.2-postgres...infisical/v0.124.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.40.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 0c214a2f2 Adjust CLI flags to be dash-case
  • bb699ecb5 Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin' into ssh-non-interactive
  • b0288c49c feat: add user get token CLI and revamp session management
  • b2360f9cc Reuse writeToFile fn in ssh connect command
  • 0265665e8 Make infisical ssh v2 work in non-interactive mode, allow reassignment of default ssh cas
